I earn money from my farm and YouTube channel.
I have never been arrested, but my stories might make you think otherwise.
one of my favorite artists is drake.

participant_2.background:
I lie to my children about eating healthy.
I like to cuddle up with my dog Wonwon on a rainy day.
i have two dogs , one pitbull and old english bulldog.
i learned piano at age 6.
I'd love to have lunch with my old coach, who taught me everything I know about football.

content.text: I would like to learn piano. What instrument did you learn first?
I learned piano at age 6. It is a difficult instrument, but very rewarding!
I like to listen to Drake. What are your favorite music artists?
I am not familiar with Drake. Are they a local artist?
No, they are from Canada, but they are very popular all over the world.
I will have to look them up. I like to listen to country music.
I do not listen to much country music, but I do enjoy some bluegrass music.
I like bluegrass too! My favorite part of the year is when the Bluegrass Festival comes to town.
I have never been to a bluegrass festival. I would love to go to one sometime.
You should! They are a lot of fun. I always have a great time.
I know it is supposed to rain later today. What do you like to do on rainy days?
I like to cuddle up with my dog Wonwon and watch movies.
That sounds like a great way to spend a rainy day. I love cuddling with my dogs too
